translated: The commentary is in five fascicles, the second, third, and fourth fascicles, along with the phonetic explanations, are from Dongta Temple. The commentary on the Sutra of Distinguishing the Stages is in one fascicle. The commentary on the Sutra of the Six Pāramitās is in four fascicles, written by Chao Wu. The commentary on the Sutra of King Śuddhodana is in one fascicle. It is briefly stated that it was written by Dao Lun. The same commentary is in one fascicle, written by Jizang. The commentary on the Sutra of Maitreya's Ascent to Tuṣita Heaven is in two fascicles, written by Jizang. The same commentary is in three fascicles, which should be examined. The same commentary is in one fascicle.🔽🔽

analyzed: 予到倭歟同經集記一卷彌勒成佛經疏一卷同經🔽疏一卷靖邁撰忍辱律師本極樂同經疏□卷圓宗🔽錄闕本同經疏三卷璟興釋三經同經古迹三卷同🔽上或云太賢可尋同經述贊三卷三經共贊璟興同🔽經疏一卷憬法師同經遊意一卷吉藏上下兩經遊
translated: The commentary is divided into five fascicles, the second, third, and fourth fascicles, along with the phonetic explanations, are from Dongta Temple. The commentary on the Sutra of Distinguishing the Stages is one fascicle. The commentary on the Sutra of the Six Perfections is four fascicles, written by Chao Wu. The commentary on the Sutra of King Bandhumat is one fascicle. It is briefly stated that it was written by Dao Lun, the same commentary is one fascicle, written by Jizang. The commentary on the Sutra of Maitreya's Ascent to the Tuṣita Heaven is two fascicles, written by Ji. Three fascicles should be examined for the same. The record of the essential points of the commentary is one fascicle. The record of the collection of the same sutra is one fascicle. The commentary on the Sutra of Maitreya Becoming a Buddha is one fascicle, the same sutra. The commentary on the same sutra is one fascicle, written by Jing Mai. The commentary on the same sutra is missing fascicles, written by Yuan Zong. The commentary on the same sutra is three fascicles, explained by Jing Xing. The ancient traces of the same sutra are three fascicles. The same. It is said that the above may be Tai Xian, which should be sought. The commentary on the same sutra is three fascicles, jointly commented on the three sutras by Jing Xing. The commentary on the same sutra is one fascicle, written by Shi Jing. The contemplation of the same sutra is one fascicle, written by Jizang, the upper and lower sutras.

The praise of the Lengyan jing by Zizhaofang Qingsu Gongfeng in one fascicle was written by Zhenxing based on Tiantai. The preface to the same sutra in one fascicle.
